   18:-module(erl_internal_SUITE).
   19:
   20:-export([all/1]).
   21:
   22:-export([behav/1]).
   23:
   24:-export([init_per_testcase/2, fin_per_testcase/2]).
   25:
   26:-include("test_server.hrl").
   27:
   28:all(suite) -> [behav].
   29:
   30:-define(default_timeout, ?t:minutes(2)).
   31:
   32:init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   33:    ?line Dog = test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
   34:    [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
   35:
   36:fin_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   37:    Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
   38:    test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
   39:    ok.
   40:
   41:behav(suite) -> [];
   42:behav(doc) ->
   43:    ["Check that the behaviour callbacks are correctly defined"];
   44:behav(_) ->
   45:    ?line check_behav_list([{start,2}, {stop,1}], 
   46:			   application:behaviour_info(callbacks)),
   47:    ?line check_behav_list([{init,1}, {handle_call,3}, {handle_cast,2},
   48:			    {handle_info,2}, {terminate,2}, {code_change,3}],
   49:			   gen_server:behaviour_info(callbacks)),
   50:    ?line check_behav_list([{init,1}, {handle_event,3}, {handle_sync_event,4},
   51:			    {handle_info,3}, {terminate,3}, {code_change,4}],
   52:			   gen_fsm:behaviour_info(callbacks)),
   53:    ?line check_behav_list([{init,1}, {handle_event,2}, {handle_call,2},
   54:			    {handle_info,2}, {terminate,2}, {code_change,3}],
   55:			   gen_event:behaviour_info(callbacks)),
   56:    ?line check_behav_list( [{init,1}, {terminate,2}], 
   57:			   supervisor_bridge:behaviour_info(callbacks)),
   58:    ?line check_behav_list([{init,1}],
   59:			   supervisor:behaviour_info(callbacks)),
   60:    ok.
   61:
   62:check_behav_list([], []) -> ok;
   63:check_behav_list([L | L1], L2) ->
   64:    ?line true = lists:member(L, L2),
   65:    ?line L3 = lists:delete(L, L2),
   66:    check_behav_list(L1, L3).
   67:
   68:
The transformation of this file (69 lines) took 0.00 seconds
